cue.label: Introduction
cue.voice: Sometimes you need to jot down ideas or track personal reminders without cluttering the team's shared board.

cue.label: Private
cue.voice: Local tasks give you a private workspace. Visible only to you, invisible to version control.

cue.label: Promote
cue.voice: When your experiment turns into something real, promote it to the shared project with a single command.

cue.label: Clean
cue.voice: See everything together, or filter to hide your private scratchpad entirely. It's your workspace.
